name: VEIN - Demo
description:
VIGIL MINING GROUP
Worker Orientation

Your current assignment is projected to bring you into contact with the Strata. Our records indicate that this will be your first time encountering Strata, so we would like to stress the following points:

1. Strata poses no physical danger to you. It should be treated as any other material.

2. Reactions of nausea or psychological unease have been observed - please report any difficulties you encounter to a supervisor.

3. Additional showering may be required following extraction, but be assured that everything will wash out.

Arrow keys or WASD to move, the rest is explained as you go.
